channel.title: Lots of help needed!
channel.description:
Hello everyone =)
I'm not [s]really[/s] at all good at coding do I need you guys to help me. If all goes well you will be rewarded. It won't be in rs cash because I quit that ages ago! I can make you mod/admin on my server though ;D Anyway, heres the list I of all the things to do :eek: My server is based on EvilScape but I would like to make it more unique :P so please help
[u]TO DO LIST[/u]
1. I need to know how to change the starting screen/main menu e.g:Welcome to DarkerScape(name of my server) and all the rest of the things. 2. I need to change all the emotes to things like bank, train, jad etc etc. 3. I need to know how to change the quest list into things people might need e.g: help, commands list etc 4. I need to know how to change my port. I want to change it to 1337 :D 5. I need a banner for my advertisement which I will need after all the things above :rolleyes:
I will update if I need anything or if someone has helped me do something :)
Your help would be much appreciated so please send a link or post here. Thanks for your help, I Darker I Owner of DarkerScape
P.S: Once all these things are done I will host a grand opening!

item.title: Lots of help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

  1. I need to know how to change the starting screen/main menu e.g:Welcome to DarkerScape(name of my server) and all the rest of the things.

  2. I need to change all the emotes to things like bank, train, jad etc etc.

  3. I need to know how to change the quest list into things people might need e.g: help, commands list etc

  4. I need to know how to change my port. I want to change it to 1337

  5. I need a banner for my advertisement which I will need after all the things above

  6. search in client.java mainMenu till you see a void

  7. if you already got them search them and change them else …
    add this void and change them

[code] public void emotebuttons() {
sendQuest("@blu@Home", 180);
sendQuest("@gre@Jad", 181);
sendQuest("@yel@Barrow", 178);
sendQuest("@whi@Bow", 175);
sendQuest("@whi@Angry", 177);
sendQuest("@whi@Cry", 182);
sendQuest("@whi@Laugh", 185);
sendQuest("@whi@Cheer", 186);
sendQuest("@whi@Wave", 173);
sendQuest("@whi@Beckon", 179);
sendQuest("@whi@Clap", 187);
sendQuest("@whi@Dance", 176);
sendQuest("@whi@Panic", 13371);
sendQuest("@whi@Jig", 13372);
sendQuest("@whi@Spin", 13373);
sendQuest("@whi@Head", 13374);
sendQuest("@whi@Bang", 13375);
sendQuest("@whi@Joy", 13376);
sendQuest("@whi@Jump", 13377);
sendQuest("@whi@Rasp’", 13378);
sendQuest("@whi@berry", 13379);
sendQuest("@whi@Yawn", 13380);
sendQuest("@whi@Salute", 13381);
sendQuest("@whi@Shrug", 13382);
sendQuest("@whi@Blow", 11102);
sendQuest("@whi@Kiss", 11103);

sendQuest("@whi@Glass", 6533);
sendQuest("@whi@Box", 6532);
sendQuest("@whi@Climb", 6540);
sendQuest("@whi@Rope", 6541);
sendQuest("@whi@Lean", 11101);
sendQuest("@whi@Glass", 6519);
sendQuest("@whi@Wall", 6522);

sendQuest("@whi@Goblin", 13386);
sendQuest("@whi@Bow", 13388);
sendQuest("@whi@Goblin", 13387);
sendQuest("@whi@Dance", 15170);
sendQuest("@whi@Scared", 15175);
sendQuest("@whi@Zombie", 18466);
sendQuest("@whi@Walk", 18467);
sendQuest("@whi@Zombie", 18468);
sendQuest("@whi@Dance", 18469);

}[/code]

To give it actions go to case 168: // yes emote
and change it like

case 168: // yes emote if(!teleblock) { setAnimation(715); teleportToX = 2539; teleportToY = 4719; } else if(teleblock) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } break;

  1. Will add if im not lazzy

  2. search in server.java for your port like search for 43594 and change it

  3. Google logo makers

~Zenzie♣

Read full topic

item.title: Lots of help needed!
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Changing you’re menu’s and welcome messages

First of all. To change the welcome message

[i]To change the welcome message a character receives in you’re server, simply study what it says when you login. E.G Welcome to [SERVERNAME], have a great time! To change this, you would go into you’re source file, then client.java and search for "Welcome to [SERVERNAME]" (With the "'s)

[i] You should see something like this if(playerRights < 1) { sendMessage("Welcome to [SERVERNAME], have a great time!"); } if(playerRights == 1) { sendMessage("Welcome to [SERVERNAME], have a great time Moderator "+playerName); } if(playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Welcome to [SERVERNAME], have a great time Administrator "+playerName); } Change it to whatever you wan’t.

How to change the Main Menu

This is simple, just do the same as the last time. Login and check what it says and search for it in client.java. Change it to whatever you wan’t.

Changing emote teleportations

This is simple, again, just search for whatever the emotes say, E.G “Jad” and change the coords you’ll see underneath to whereever you wan’t them to take you. You can check you’re coords by using this command : ::mypos.

Hope I helped. :rolleyes:

Read full topic
